name: Convolooption
description:
My 2020, Ludum Dare 47 game submission for the theme: "stuck in a loop".

How To Play:

Use W,A,S,D or arrow keys to control the player

Press Left Shift to slow down time and get invincibility on you trail temporarily.

Circle around enemies and powerups to kill them and collect them respectively.

( + powerups increase tail length, heart powerups increase health)
